source_image.Description: URL of the image to export

destination.Description: GCS path to export image to

export_instance_disk_image.Description: image to use for the exporter instance

export_instance_disk_size.Description: size of the export instances buffer disk, this disk starts from a fixed size which can guarantee an acceptable PD read speed, and grows on demand

export_instance_disk_type.Description: Disk type of the buffer. By default it's pd-ssd for higher speed. pd-standard can be used when pd-ssd quota is not enough

export_network.Description: Network to use for the export instance

export_subnet.Description: SubNetwork to use for the export instance

no_external_ip.Description: Specifies to create the export instance without an external IP address
